TEXT.TITLE: CCC ACCEPTS EXPORT BONUS FOR WHEAT TO SRI LANKA
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Agriculture Department said it has accepted a bid for an export bonus to cover the sale of 50,000 tonnes of hard red winter wheat to Sri Lanka. A bonus of 37.44 dlrs per tonne was awarded to Continental Grain Co on the shipment scheduled for April 8-16, Melvin Sims, USDA general sales manager said. An additional 10,000 tonnes of wheat are still available to Sri Lanka under the export enhancement program, Sims said. Reuter
